title: 9.9 Interactive Selection
description: In this genetic algorithms video, I discuss a technique known as "interactive selection" where the algorithm's fitness function is calculated based on user / viewer interaction.

timestamps.title: Welcome to another genetic algorithm video

codeExamples.title: Interactive Selection
codeExamples.description: This sketch demonstrates using interactive selection to increment the fitness values

links.title: Karl Sims Galapagos Interactive Exhibit

links.title: Artificial Evolution for Computer Graphics
links.description: This paper describes how evolutionary techniques of variation and selection can be used to create complex simulated structures, textures, and motions for use in computer graphics and animation.
